text: Zhe [leyuan] shi an la yong lai xiang xinyang bing xingshan de pu renmen baoxi de. Ni [mu sheng] shuo:“Wo bu hui wei ci [xuanchuan yisilan jiao he “gulanjing”] xiang nimen suoqu baochou de, chufei shi tongzu jian de you'ai.” Shei zuo yi jian shanshi, wo yao ci shei jiabei de baochou [zhu]. An la que shi zui kuanshu de, zuishan bao de.
